p: Virus production: The influenza A virus used in this study, containing A/FM/1/47 (H1N1), A/Beijing/32/92 (H3N2) and the H1N1 oseltamivir-resistant mutant strain A/FM/1/47-H275Y (H1N1-H275Y) (by introducing a histidine-to-tyrosine substitution at position 275 into NA [ 21]), were propagated in 10-day-old embryonated chicken eggs. Viruses were stored at −80 °C.
